replyMessage:
I'm sorry i didn't understand 
Please try to write the words clearly 
To start over try saying 'Hello' or 'Hi'

Hi, i'm Atenea
 
How can i help you? 
if you don't know how to start you can put 'Menu'

This is the Menu, 
Please write the number of your interest 
1. HR Internal Prociders
2. HR Guides 
3. HR Forms 
4. Job Description 
5. Calendar Global Day Offs
Ontop is the best place to work

Bye Bye !! Ontoper 
Have an amazing day !!

This is the link to the presentation 
<https://www.notion.so/ontopai/Internal-Procedures-caf29f6f89484d0082e91fef964dbc6a|Go to Presentation> 
 
If you need anything else, put back 'Menu', otherwise 'Bye'.

1. Fee Increase Guideline 
2. Off Days Guide

4. Offboarding step by step
